title: Paul Flores Found Guilty of Murdering Kristin Smart in 1996
description: The California student went missing after Mr. Flores, a fellow student, escorted her to the dorms after an off-campus party. She was never seen again.
dc:creator: Christine Hauser and Michael Levenson
media:description: Paul Flores during his trial in Monterey County Superior Court in Salinas, Calif., in July.
